Home Libraries People FAQ More
object::clear

Erase all elements.

Synopsis 
void
clear();
Description

Erases all elements from the container without changing the capacity. After this call, size() returns zero. All references, pointers, and iterators are invalidated.

Complexity

Linear in size().

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
